name: Dodgey Development
description:
game doesn't work because I made a mistake with the upload build and can't fix it. It's a 5 minute fix so once the voting period is over it'll work again.

A platformer game about rolling dice to determine what features work.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. The theme was Roll of the Dice.

The build at this point in time only has one level. I may add more before the end period. I kinda' overscoped but I'm still happy with the idea.

RESOURCES USED THAT I DIDN'T MAKE:
